ValidationRule.description: Data Source Table Name must be 'Daily Measure Int', 'Daily Measure Real', 'Weekly Measure Int' or 'Weekly Measure Real' if the Consider Sub Accounts is checked.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data Source Table Name must be 'Daily Measure Int', 'Daily Measure Real', 'Weekly Measure Int' or 'Weekly Measure Real' if the Consider Sub Accounts is checked.
